newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Liz Claiborne buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Liz Claiborne buy repeated.

text.p: -- Rodman & Renshaw repeated its buy recommendation for Liz Claiborne Inc
-- Analyst Marie de Lucia said the retailer is in the early stages of returning to a premier fashion growth stock.

-- She said current level of company's sales versus on-hand stock is stronger than it has been in some time, spring 1997 bookings are up in line with expectations and summer 1997 market weeks have drawn a good retail response.

-- De Lucia said the 12- to 18-month price target remains at $60, with estimated fourth-quarter 1996 earnings per share still at $0.52 before accounting charge versus $0.45 during same period last year. Estimated pre-charge 1996 annual earnings are $2.10 versus 1995's $1.69.
-- She said she reiterated buy recommendation after attending analyst group luncheon presentation in New York on Monday by retailer's top management.
-- Liz Claiborne stock closed up 1/8 at 42-7/8. --Chicago Newsdesk (312) 408-8787
